article.title: DARPA Awards Two Classified Contracts
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Moorestown, N.J., is being awarded an $11,037,154 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract, and Science Applications International Corp., McLean, Va., is being awarded an $8,086,263 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract. The statement of work for both is classified. The Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency is the contracting activity.
